description:
The Old-Clothes Dealer is a young man living in the town of Guri. The Haibane (who can`t use new goods) get their clothing from his shop (which shows a "Haibane Renmei" sign next to its door), in exchange for a page of their notebook.
Despite lamenting most of the time he`s a nice guy and gives Haibane in need a "special service". He`s particular fond of http://anidb.net/ch9898 [Rakka] and acts as her support when possible.
name: Furugiya
